DOC.brief_title: Intrauterine Injection Human Chorionic Gonadotropin Injection ( hCG ) Before Embryo Transfer Pregnancy Outcomes Frozen Embryo Transfer Cycles .
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize double blind clinical trial conduct evaluate effect intrauterine injection human chorionic gonadotropin ( hCG ) freeze embryo transfer ( ET ) . The study protocol approve Ethics Committee ( Institutional Review Board ) Royan institute . The study perform accord Declaration Helsinki medical research . All participant provide inform consent explain purpose study . All patient primary infertility one fresh implantation failure undergo frozen embryo transfer cycle enrol . In patient , endometrial preparation perform hormonal replacement method . In way , endometrial preparation start second third day menstrual cycle daily administration 6 mg oral estradiol valerate ( Estraval® , Aburaihan CO , Tehran , Iran ) 8 day . After 8 day estradiol administration , favourable thickness endometrium ( ≥ 8 mm ) confirm ultrasound , estradiol valerate continue dose 50 mg progesterone ( Progestin® , Aburaihan Pharmaceutical . Co. , Tehran , Iran ) intramuscularly administer 3 day embryos transfer . Otherwise dosage estradiol increase 8 mg/day favourable thickness endometrium achieve . In Embryo transfer day , eligible patient randomize use seal opaque envelope three group . In study group , patient put lithotomy position , cervix visualize use Cusco 's speculum . The cervical mucous wipe use sterile piece gauze , mucous partially remove gentle suction 1-mL syringe . Embryo transfer perform use soft catheter ( Labotec , Gottingen Germany ) . After catheter pass internal cervical o ; group A ( experimental group ) 40 μL tissue culture medium ( G.2plus ref . 10132 , Vitrolife ) contain either 500 IU hCG ( Choriomon® , IBSA SA , Switzerland ) inject intrauterine . In group B ( placebo group ) 40 μL tissue culture medium ( G.2plus ref . 10132 , Vitrolife ) inject intrauterine . In group , approximately 7 minute injection , embryo load another ET catheter transfer uterine cavity . In group C ( control group ) , ET do without intrauterine hCG injection . The ET procedure perform like two group . According patient ' age , 3 frozen-thawed Embryos thaw transfer cleavage stage . Hormone therapy continue pregnancy test ( 2 week ET ) perform case positive pregnancy , administration estradiol valerate progesterone continue 10 12 week gestation . Chemical pregnancy define rise hCG level serum without detection gestational sac . Clinical pregnancy diagnose presence gestational sac fetal heart vaginal ultrasonography . The miscarriage rate define loss pregnancy 20 week ' gestational age .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patients history one fresh embryo transfer failure 2 . Patients Primary infertility 3 . Patients least one embryo excellent quality 1 . Female age 40 year old 2 . Severe male factor ( Azoospermia ) 3 . Endometriosis diagnosis presence hydrosalpinges 4 . Uterine factor ( polyp , myoma previous myomectomy , … ) 5 . Patients polycystic ovarian syndrome diagnosis 6 . Cases preimplantation genetic diagnosis ( PGD ) indication 7 . Cases difficult embryo transfer use Tenaculum 8 . Patients repeat implantation failure repeat miscarriage . 9 . Female smoker
